########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND HighDataRate_Modem_sources
    TAG_CHUNKpreamble_impl.cc
    Chunk_ExtractQPSK_impl.cc
    Chunk_ExtractBPSK_impl.cc
    Encode_RS_impl.cc
    libfec/decode_rs_8.c
    libfec/decode_rs_ccsds.c
    libfec/decode_rs_char.c
    libfec/encode_rs_8.c
    libfec/encode_rs_ccsds.c
    libfec/encode_rs_char.c
    libfec/taltab.c
    libfec/ccsds.c
    libfec/init_rs_char.c
    Decode_RS_impl.cc
    Frame_Extract_ff_impl.cc
    Frame_Extract_bb_impl.cc
    Tag_FrameASM_ff_impl.cc
    Tag_FrameASM_bb_impl.cc
    Resolve_Phase_impl.cc
)

set(HighDataRate_Modem_sources "${HighDataRate_Modem_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT HighDataRate_Modem_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT HighDataRate_Modem_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-HighDataRate_Modem SHARED ${HighDataRate_Modem_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-HighDataRate_Modem gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-HighDataRate_Modem
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-HighDataRate_Modem PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_HighDataRate_Modem_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-HighDataRate_Modem PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-HighDataRate_Modem)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_HighDataRate_Modem_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-HighDataRate_Modem)

if(NOT test_HighDataRate_Modem_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_HighDataRate_Modem_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_HighDataRate_Modem_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("HighDataRate_Modem_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
